text: @thehill It's amazing how these Trump sycophants march to the same beat.  Their tone and dress are all the same. Ted Cruz, Paul Ryan and now Ran Paul are all now sporting anemic beards, that look more like half-watered militia hedges! #COVID19 #coronavirus
